name: ecommerce
description: This project showcases the development of a full-stack e-commerce application, built with **Node.js**, **Express.js**, **Angular**, and **PostgreSQL**. The backend implements CRUD operations for sales orders and products, while the frontend provides an interactive and dynamic user interface for browsing products, making purchases, and viewing orders.

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix ecom-client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.start: npm run install:all && concurrently "npm run start --prefix ecom-client" "npm run dev --prefix server"
